Detailed Description

This maintains a 'census' of all named DataSections that are currently alive.

This allows quick lookup of named sections which are alive (but not neccessarily in the cache anymore). It does not hold onto a strong reference to the DataSections. DataSections are not automatically added to the census (because not all DataSections have a name), but they are automatically removed from the census when they die.

This method adds a data section to the census.

They can't add themselves, because they do not know (and may not have) their own file name

void DataSectionCensus::del ( DataSection *  pSect  ) 

This method removes a data section from the census.

This should only happen when the data section is being destructed.

This method clears everything from the census.
